flawed_nl_solution:
She originally dropped 5000/25=<<5000/25=2000>>2000 kernels of popcorn.
The squirrel ate 2000/4=<<2000/4=500>>500 kernels of popcorn.
Therefore, 2000-500=<<2000-500=1500>>1500 kernels of popcorn remain on the ground.
#### 1500

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200, not 2000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
